remarks: Subtraction of an inverse.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2015.)
statement:
grpsubinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubinv.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubinv.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpsubinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpsubinv.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
grpsubinv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
grpsubinv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
grpsubinv $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- ( N ` Y ) ) = ( X .+ Y ) ) $.
